title: 10 of the best activity family sports holidays
text:
10 of the best activity family sports holidays 10 of the best activity family sports holidays SADDLE up in Portugal, ride the waves in Morocco or play tennis in the Caribbean – whatever you choose, don't be without this guide! PUBLISHED: 11:10, Tue, Aug 11, 2015 | UPDATED: 11:45, Tue, Aug 11, 2015 GETTY Best places to visit for family sports holiday 
1. Best for sport with swimming: Thailand. 
Make a splash in tropical Thailand on an action-packed family holiday with sports and swimming. 
Tree Club kids club offers a variety of training camps from swimming to cycling and tennis. 
Improve your swimming with lessons in the 50m Olympic pool, before heading to the beach for a family game of volleyball. 
Tel: Health and Fitness Travel 0203 397 8891. Seven nights at Thanyapura from £1,895pp (full board, return flights and transfers). www.healthandfitnesstravel.com/destinations/asia/thailand/thanyapura/thanyapura-family-holiday/ 
2. Best for horse riding: Portugal. 
Saddle-up with the family on a horse riding holiday in Portugal that comes with an Equestrian Centre which has 230 stables with outdoor and indoor riding school. 
Instruction available for all levels so, while the kids learn the basics, you can canter off with the experts. Make a splash in tropical Thailand on an action-packed family holiday with sports and swimming 
Other activities include tennis, biking, golf and surfing. Health and Fitness Travel offers three nights at The Oitavos from £910pp. 
Price includes breakfast, a horse riding programme, return flights and transfers. Tel: 0203 397 8891 
3. Great for tennis: Antigua. 
Escape to the Caribbean where budding beginners and pros get professional tuition at the resort tennis academy before joining together for ‘round robin’ games of tennis. 
Complimentary water sports include windsurfing, snorkelling, water skiing to paddle boarding. 
Seven nights at Carlisle Bay from £2,715pp with Health and Fitness Travel includes breakfast, return flights and transfers. 
4. Best for Surfing: Morocco. 
Ride the waves in Morocco and learn to surf. Lessons available for all ages and abilities. 
While the kids try their hand at sports and arts activities with the kids club, mix up your healthy holiday with a beachside yoga class or beach circuit training. 
Seven nights nights at Paradis Plage from £1,035pp. Price includes breakfast, return flights and transfers. www.healthandfitnesstravel.com/destinations/africa-indian-ocean/morocco/paradis-plage/paradis-plage-family-holiday/ 
5. Best for multi-activity: St Lucia. 
Keep active in the Caribbean on an action-packed family holiday at an all-inclusive luxury resort. 
Enjoy a bit of healthy competition in the parent vs children competitions, including volleyball and beach-a-thalons, or cook up a storm together in the healthy family cooking classes. 
Activities range from dance classes and cycling adventures, to abseiling. Seven nights at The BodyHoliday from £1,935pp. 
Price includes full board, return flights and transfers. www.healthandfitnesstravel.com/destinations/caribbean/st-lucia/the-bodyholiday/the-bodyholiday-family-holiday/ 
6. Best for golf: Madeira. 
Make the most of magical Madeira with exciting activities from snorkelling and diving plus two championship golf courses to explore. 
The kids can let loose at the kids club with a game of badminton and ping pong, or try kayaking and snorkelling. Enhance your fitness with complimentary group classes from body balance to spinning and pilates. Related articles
